alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:03PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern La Salle County through 345 PM CDT... At 303 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wenona, or 13 miles west of Streator, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tonica around 315 PM CDT. Oglesby and Grand Ridge around 325 PM CDT. North Utica around 330 PM CDT. Naplate around 335 PM CDT. Ottawa around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Leonore, Lostant, Cedar Point, Rutland and Kangley. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 41 and 62. I-80 between mile markers 78 and 93. This includes... Buffalo Rock State Park, Illini State Park, Illinois Valley Community College, Matthiessen State Park, and Starved Rock State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
